name: Just Say the Word!
summary:
A new take on a familiar board and parlor game. Fun, quick and easy! Play hands-free, no typing required, with only the sound of your voice. Everyone from 13 to 100 year olds will love it as though they were on their very own game show – right on their own PC!

Each round, one team member becomes The Speaker, whose mission is to make their team say as many of The Words as possible, without using any of the Forbidden Words! Can you describe a Unicorn without mentioning “horn”, “mythical” or “fantasy”? What about “shark” without “jaws”, “bite” or “tornado”?
